casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Simons, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Simons, 132 Ohio St.3d 411, 2012-Ohio-3213.]

(No. 2011-0990 Submitted July 11, 2012 Decided July 18, 2012.) Nick A. Selvaggio, Champaign County Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Carl R. Simons, pro se.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Davis, 132 Ohio St.3d 25, 2012-Ohio-1654, 968 N.E.2d 466.

O’Connor, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, Cupp, and McGee Brown, JJ., concur.
